label: 大膳職
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Important office (shiki) under the Ministry of the Imperial Household (Kunaishō). In charge of the food sent in as tribute (chō) from the provinces, preparation of food for the palace officials. [宮内省、調]
